38958019.review: This is a crazy amount of silly fun. Looking forward to seeing how this game develops.

38876026.review: I first played this game at PAX West in 2016. It was absolutely one of my favorite games of the whole con. A friend of mine and I played this for a solid half hour and got to talk with the devs as we played. Random people were coming up to the booth as well and as we all took turns playing rounds, you could hear the laughs a cheers thoughout the indie section. I had waited for this game to come out on steam and realized I missed it by a couple months. I am so glad I found it again and I  am so excited to break it out when we have friends over at our place. Im glad someone is bringing back quality couch co-op games.

38709238.review: Stop looking at the reviews and just buy it.

38670444.review:
Awesome game! This game have incredibly smooth controls. It's super fun play with friends and make they character in pieces LOL!

If you want a game to play in a house party, this is your game!

38636945.review: I played this game early on at Siggraph. Was an amazing experience. Been waiting for the early access. Played with some friends the other night. Could not stop laughing. Definitely recommend for a party game. Grantee a good time.

38056711.review:
Гладиаторские бои с друзьяи - это шикарное занятие:)
На данный момент игра сыровата, но с большим потенциалом.
Бой происходит между 4мя бойцами, на арену постоянно добавляется оружие.
Если не хватает друзей для полной пати, то можно добавить ботов.
Играть лучше с геймпада, вдвоем на одной клавиатуре не поиграть.
Вообщем для хорошего вечера с друзьями рекомендуем;)

Обзор\Геймплей - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1sBjQDwi9MA

Хорошего настроения и удачи!
Мишка и Юля

37940114.review:
The wind blows softly through my hair as I gaze up at the small square of sky above me.  I flash back to my home in the wheat laiden hills of Rome with my beautiful wife and family. Oh what I would give to be back there running my hands across those very fields now...the rattling of chains and grit of sand wakes me from my daydream like state...I taste the salt in the air, I hear the roar of the crowd...the rattling stops, I stand now on a small wood platform surrounded by a desert deseigned for death and carnage, enclosed by walls unfit for climing.  "For those who are about to die, we salute you" echos throughout the arena...I step off my platform in full realization of where and what I am now...

I am a gladiator
a man
a warrior...

a god, and this arena is my kingdom.


I then proceed to get hit in the back with a spear thrown by my buddy and instantaneously die as he laughs and tells me how he had intercourse with my mom last week.

10/10 would have an out of body immersive experience completly soiled by my buddy lying about intercourse with my mom again

37782245.review:
Très bon jeu à 4 en local ! Un gameplay facile à prendre en main, mais qui se perfectionne au fil des parties. J'y joue avec des amis lors de soirées et je peux vous garantir que vous allez bien rire.
Les devs sont vraiment à fond avec la communauté et très à l'écoute. FONCEZ !

37621176.review:
ARENA GODS:
~~~~~~~~~~~  

One of the most deadly games ever invented by humans was officially recorded in 264 BC. And yes, you guessed it . . .  it’s the Gladiator Games. The interesting point is some of them actually volunteer to become swordsmen in order to rise to fame and improve their social standing within the state of Rome. But most of the so-called Gladiators were prisoners of war, thieves and slaves. They were trained under harsh conditions in secluded Gladiator schools until they were ready to walk into the Arena for the first, and for a large number of them, the last time. Now, are you going to be our next champion and crowd favourite, and even become a god of the Roman people? That is, if you can survive long enough in Arena Gods!

ARENA GODS is a top down local multiplayer game where you take control of one of four colourful gladiators and aim to be the last man alive in the arena. At the time I write this review, this game is currently under development and listed as an Early Access Game.

Right now, you can play against three of your friends, or against bots. Your goal is to become the last man standing for three rounds to win the contest. As you face three other opponents there is the possibility for you to play up to nine rounds (assuming that each gladiator won two rounds each) before winning the contest. 

The game play is pretty simple; competitive, brutal and so much fun! Within the arena, you have four large tiles with circles on them, and several smaller tiles with hexagon motifs on them, scatted around the arena. The gladiators will enter the Lion den via the large tiles at the same time, with bare hands and a helmet. During the fights, about every fifteen seconds or so, one of the hexagon symbols on one of the smaller tiles will glow white and a chest will appear. Hover your character over the chest to discover which weapon it holds. You will have to grab the weapon first by using one of the buttons on your gamepad or keyboard to acquire it. You’ll be able to swing or even throw it to your opponent for the kill. However, you haven’t managed to pick up a weapon, your fist will be doing the talking. Try to get your adversaries on the ground face down, jump on him and his day will be over soon. If you character is the one who is kissing the ground, you might be able to avoid your enemy before he is on top of you and beating you to a pulp!

The game looks ok in regards to the graphics, and the controls are pretty good too. So far, I am enjoying the game. The content is fairly small right now as you have just a few arenas to play in and no character customizations. The good news is that the developers are working on more content in regards to the arena and might even consider an online mode, too.
 
Positives:
~~~~~~~ 

-	Nice graphics
-	Fun, Fast gameplay
-	One achievement

Negatives:
~~~~~~~~

-	Needs more content
-	A few bugs here and there
-	No trading cards 

Arena gods is one of the local multiplayer games to keep an eye on. It’s fun so far!

6/10

Key provided by developer/publisher for review purposes. Any opinions expressed are entirely my own!

[url=https://www.zeepond.com/reviews][b]EPIC “THE CPT FROGGY” REVIEWS UP NOW ON ZEEPOND, THE HOME OF THE ALMIGHTY FROG![/b][/url]

37600404.review: Been following since pre-alpha and this game has potential! Best played with friends.

37106469.review:
This game is the absolute hit of every game night that I host.  If you have people over and enjoy competetive couch games, this is a must have.  I was hosting game nights every other week for the last year or so with a group that has a very wide range of skill levels.  This game provides enough chaos, chance and "wow" moments to allow for those with less skill to have a great time, while also allowing those with skill to execute eye popping moves.

The Dev, Mark, is a great person.  I've talked to him at PAX East a couple of times and he has always been quite open about the aspirations for the game and what corrections he has wanted to make with the game.  He has followed through.  We had relied on the pre-alpha version for our game nights for a long time and everyone has been thrilled with the update.  

There's definitely still a couple things that can be tweeked, but updates seem to be pretty regular and make noticeable changes.  I cannot recommend this game enough.

37006313.review: This game kind of ruins all other local multiplayer games. Once you load this up, every other game becomes less fun because the bar is raised so high. Its a perfect example of easy to play, hard to master. Arena Gods is by far the best local multiplayer game I have ever played.

36339839.review:
While enjoyable, this game is rough around the edges. I'm shocked because it has been in development for years and I would have thought that the game would either have been released in 2015 with some bugs or emerge in 2017 highly polished. Fortunately, it is still really fun to play.

I noticed that the developer recently added a feature where the camera zooms and pans during the death kill. I really do not like this feature, and would love a way to turn it off.

With all of that said, if you are looking for a good local arena battle game, Arena Gods is a lot of fun. I really hope the developer continues to improve the game because it could greatly benefit from some refinements.

36129551.review: This is the best couch multiplayer game I've ever played, I highly recommend it!

35984009.review: The best couch multiplayer game i have ever played. we played nonstop fpr 2 hours, very addicting

35930939.review: So much fun. Gladiator version of Gang Beast. A few tweaks here/there and they could have a must play. Being Early Access and just the first few days release I have no complaints at all. Now lets see if the devs continue to work on this and turn it into all it can be.

35909886.review:
Some of the best, rowdiest local multiplayer fun I've ever had—like a long-lost "grown up" companion to SportsFriends: fluid, fast, and super easy to pick up…but not a stretch to imagine it gathering a seriously competitive crowd.

I can't imagine having a living room PC without this—it feels like the purest social gaming experience outside of an arcade.

35909426.review: This game is amazing, i would recommend it to all of my freinds, if i had any.

35901902.review: I was fortunate enough to be a part of the beta testing in this game and it is a blast! Played it for the first time since release last night with a friend and we had so much fun. It's definitely stressful with how much is going on as well as the fast pace of the game, but it adds up to a lot of fun. This is recommended for anyone looking for a good time with some friends as well as ruin friendships. Also the single player that has been implemented so far is alright with the bots, but the bots could use some work as the continues to be updated.

35877836.review:
Played this game in Alpha, in Beta at PAX, in Open Beta on Steam, and I bought it as soon as it came out.
It's been an instant classic, and brings back the sorely-missed 'couch game' - I've spent hours playing this with my friends!
Can't wait to see where this game goes next.

It's easy to get the hang of it but a real challenge if you have a really determined friend as your adversary. I recommend it also because I'm an old school gamer who miss the good old "couch multiplayer" that we experienced growing up in the 80s and 90s with a console in the living room in front of a TV.

35876695.review:
I first played this 4 years ago, and begged for a copy to show my friends.
I played it again 2 years after, and begged again.
I finally just got a beta, and played an hour with my roomates.
We'll probably get a noise complaint.
Worth it. So good.
This game is simple - it doesn't try to do more than it should, but what it does, it does very well.
The mechanics are smooth.

It's one of those games where you get just good enough to beat your buds, then that forces them to get just a bit better to beat you, and before you know it you have an eSports league running nights in your basement.

Thank you, it's beautiful.

35863977.review: O que dizer deste jogo! Na primeira vez que vi o jogo, já sabia que seria um sucesso! Venho acompanhando o jogo ha alguns meses, e digo com tranquilidade que o jogo é fantastico! Comprem sem medo. Sempre que jogo com minha familia é diversão garantida! Parabéns pelo jogo!

With some solid dev, this has the potential to be as fun as Smash Bros for local MP. Highly, highly recommend buying this.

35849867.review:
[h1]ARENA GODS - аркадный арена-файтинг про гладиаторов, с раслчененкой и тремя друзьям в рекомендованных системных требованиях[/h1]

[b]ARENA GODS[/b] только-только вышла в раннем доступе, поэтому в ней пока очень много чего не хватает. Нам с друзьями контента хватило на 45 минут игры, а после нам всем как-то синхронно стало скучновато. При этом надо отдать должное Supertype — геймплей игры вылизан и отполирован до блеска. Все что должно работать в ARENA GODS работает и, что еще важнее, делает это исключительно правильно. 

Игра захватывает вас с первых минут, она яркая, она интересная, в ней есть глубина, но контент пока кончается слишком быстро, чтобы было интересно эти глубины геймплея исследовать и познавать. Пока в ARENA GODS всего один режим игры, нет возможности выбрать себе гладиатора (он назначается автоматически), всего одна арена и в целом ничего, чтобы заинтересовать надолго, игра не предлагает. Никаких тебе ловушек, львов, выпрыгивающих из прохода, режимов, где игроки могут делиться 2 на 2 или все вчетвером противостоять каким-то компьютерным противникам. Вполне возможно, что все это нас еще ждет — и я очень хочу в это верить. 

[h1]Впрочем, даже сейчас игра довольно весела, но только если вам есть с кем поиграть, сидя на одном диване – без друзей в ARENA GODS делать определенно нечего.[/h1]

Полный обзор: http://blast-games.ru/obzori/arena-gods-obzor/

35834784.review:
[h1]«ARENA GODS®»[/h1]
Сражения гладиаторов. Deathmatch на аренах с видом сверху для одного игрока или для компании до 4 человек за одним компьютером (один экран без разделения).
Геймплей:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bWZRdi5cVN8

Игра представляет собой сражения на арене между четырьмя гладиаторами. Побеждает последний выживший.

Арены меняются каждый раунд. Выглядят они по-спартански. На полу генерируется разнообразное холодное оружие, которое может подобрать любой, кто подбежит первым. Причем в этой игре [u]взять оружие, шлем или щит можно в каждую руку[/u]! Можно бить соперников руками, разрубать мечами, забивать щитами до смерти. Острым оружием можно ухитрится и разрубить врага пополам или отрубить конечность! 

Любой предмет (даже отрубленную конечность) можно подобрать, метнуть, а если достаточно приловчиться, то отклонить или поймать на лету. 

[u]Опрокинув соперника на землю надо постараться быстро запрыгнуть на него кнопкой «F» и добить[/u]. Анимация добивания разная, зависит от позы врага в момент, когда вы на него запрыгиваете. Это выглядит очень эпично. Когда враг умирает, то вокруг образуется лужа кровищи. Если при попытке запрыгнуть, вы промахнетесь, то упадете на землю, а враг получит возможность запрыгнуть и добить вас!

Гладиаторы напоминают разноцветных резиновых Шреков, но анимация у них качественная, разнообразная, а временами очень забавная.

[code]Игра веселая и динамичная. Матчи быстрые, почти мгновенные (1-2 минуты). Тут не успеваешь заскучать.[/code] 

Можно играть одному с ботами. Боты не шибко умные, но очень проворные. Играть в компании будет намного интереснее!

Если будете играть в компании, то учтите, что [u]для каждого игрока потребуется свой контроллер[/u]. Один игрок может играть на клавиатуре, но если вы подключите только один контроллер, то его игра не распознает, как второго игрока. Управление просто дублируется, вы сможете играть на клавиатуре или геймпаде, но за желтого гладиатора.[u]Чтобы сыграть вдвоем надо подключить минимум два контроллера[/u]!

[u] Вы можете почитать другие отзывы и подписаться на наших кураторов. Добро пожаловать! [/u] 
[url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/25737869/] 5 minutes of game [/url]

35823451.review: Игра отлично подойдет для компании от двух до четырех человек. Одному играть можно, но только в целях ознакомления, так как самый фан в противостоянии живому игроку. На самых крутых настройках картинка более чем приличная. В сочетании с кровищей, которая льется при протыкании более чем прикольно. Все битвы происходят очень быстро, сражения идут до трех побед. При недостатке игроков можно добрать ботов, которые на мой взгляд вполне самостоятельные и с ними можно посоревноваться. Что собираются добавить: больше оружия, музыку и другие режимы. Режимов действительно не хватает, а именно возможностей битв два на два, может еще что придумают. Играли втроем, получили кучу фана. Если у вас бывают гости с которыми можно позабавится, можно рассмотреть, но цена конечно кусается.

35806677.review:
The gameplay is solid and the presentation is great, but that's it for now. There are many bugs, the keyboard controls are borked and the UI/menus are much too lacking. As well as this there's no form of online connection.

However, this game has a lot of promise with it being in early access. I hope that it flourishes and fixes its issues and quickly adds more content soon. Definitely give this game a try with a friend or two, but be wary if alone.

35802188.review:
The first time I saw this game there was a bunch of people cheering and shouting in front of the monitor. It really peaked my curiosity to check if the game was about. 

When I played though, I got instantly killed by someone that had played just one match before me. The next match didn't take long ro start, and... voilà... the contols were so keen, I managed to kill two opponents before a thilling duel against some other player that managed to dodge the speat I threw.

Little did I know it would loop up and get me backstabbed. The crowd went wild with cheers again.

35800939.review:
This game....

I thought I'd play a few rounds with my brother and then get back to work but three hours passed by and we want more!

Surely there's lots of room for improvment but given the early access state of it, I got to say that I'm having a blast!  Can't wait for the future of this game, I'm sure it'll be worth the wait.

Buy this game if you're looking for insta-fun with your friends. Totally worth even in the early-access!

35796933.review:
#อ่านให้จบ#

การเล่น 
     เป็นเกมเร็ว เรียบง่ายดี เก็บอาวุธ โยนอาวุธ กลิ้งหลบ (แต่รู้สึกว่าจะตายง่ายไปหน่อย โดยเฉพาะเวลาล้ม เช่น กลิ้งชนกำแพง โดนชกมัดเดียวแล้วมีคนมานั่งต่อยตอนล้ม มัน...ลุกหรือเคาเตอร์ ไม่ได้) 

อุปกร์การเล่น 
     ถ้าเล่นในจอย จะเล่นได้ง่ายกว่าคีย์บอร์ด (มีใช้เมาส์เล่นด้วย เลยรู้สึกแปลกๆ ต่างจากเกมทั่วไป มันไม่มันมืออ่ะ) เพราะตัวเกมทำมาให้เล่นในจอยโดยเฉพาะ แล้วต้องเล่นกับเพื่อนๆหรือใครก็ได้ เตรียมหาจอยมาได้เลย 4 ตัว (ยังดีกว่า คีบอร์ดกับเมาส์อันหนึ่ง/คน)

อารมณ์เวลาเล่น
     1.คนเดียว เล่นกับบอกทั้ง 3 โง่หรือฉลาดไม่รู้ แล้วบอทมันไม่ชอบเสือกคู่ของคนอื่น พอมีคนล้มแล้วมีคนมาตี มันจะยืนดู พออีกคนตายแม่งก็จะตีไอคนที่มันนั่งตีอยู่นั้นแหละ...มันเล่นกวนมาก 
     2.เล่นกับเพื่อน (ยังไม่มีระบบทีม) ดุด่าเพื่อนยังไงก็ได้ กวนตีนเพื่อนได้ แกล้งมันได้ ลุมมันได้ และหัวร้อนได้

การอัปเดต (ยังไม่มีและอยากให้มี)
     1.ยังไม่มีการเล่นกับผู้คนในเครือข่าย
     2.ระบบการเล่น (ที่อาจจะสามารถปรับได้ เช่น ด่าน อุปสรรคก่อกวน การต่อย อาวุธ เท่าที่สามารถมีได้)

#ถ้าจะซื้อ! ยํ้าเลยว่าต้องมีเพื่อนและจอย ถ้าคุณไม่มีสิ่งเหล่านี้...แล้วแต่คุณเลย.

35793438.review: cannot play in keyboard and controller at the same time ,but i love this game very mich

35789349.review: This is a very nice game. Very competitive. Perfect to play online with friends. Definately worth buying.

35788743.review: 배타때 부터 했음.  집에 놀러온 친구랑 한다면 더할 나위없이좋은 게임입니다만 행사이후로 친구랑 같이 할수없던게 마음ㅔ 걸리네요 어서 업뎃및 출시가 되길바라고 기대가 됩니다

35787729.review: Quick paced and non-stop fun to play. Can't stop laughing at the crazyness going on in the arena.

35787234.review:
自从2015年gdc china上看到这款游戏后，就一直在等着正式发售。跟那时候的pre alpha版相比，画面改的更加精细（虽然我还是挺喜欢原来那种风格的），玩法还是那个熟悉的味道，找几个朋友，充满欢乐的一块互撕。

地图循环和投掷武器的跟踪性是这个游戏的亮点，由于这个设定，游戏充满了戏剧性。尤其是那张非常开阔，只有地图中间有一个很小障碍物的地图，更是充满欢乐，人多的情况下，你会看到满场横飞的武器，所有人都疲于躲避，大家玩过就能体会。游戏节奏很快，刚上手可能还有点不适应，尤其是扔和挥刀总是控制不好，不同武器之间的交互以及双持武器也把游戏操作深度提升了。目前来看，玩法模式和内容略有单薄，玩法上和之前的版本似乎差异并不太大，也没有一些自定义地图/设置等选项，另外联网对战模式也没有，希望开发者能加上。不过毕竟是EA，后面还是有很多提升空间的。

总之是一款核心玩法非常扎实充满欢乐的多人聚会游戏，希望开发者后续扩展游戏内容和玩法，加入联网功能。推荐给各位有几个好友可以一块互相撕逼的朋友。

35784145.review: Jogo muito divertido! Me lembra os clássicos para videogame, recomendo!

35782068.review: Awesome game! Been playing since the alpha and it has been a lot of fun to see the game evolve. Played with a bunch of my friends this weekend and it was one of the best times playing a console game we've had in awhile. Definitely recommend!

35781466.review: This game is buggy but super fun, been playing since pre-alpha! Lacks a lot of important features like selecting the amount of rounds per game or selecting helmets/colors/maps but that's to be expected I guess for an early access title on the first day of release. Despite all of its missing features it is still an extremely fun and addicting game to play with some friends. I am excited to see what the developers have in store!

35779875.review: totally awesome this game - playing since pre alpha.

39352047.review: Ein richtig gutes Partyspiel mit Freunden , haben schon mehrere Stunden das Game gesuchtet da es einfach Laune macht gegeneinander anzutreten, kann es jedem empfehlen der gerne mit Freunden an einem TV zockt :D , hoffe es kommt bald mehr Features wie vllt Löwen oder Fangnetze und Fallen :D :D :D
